discourse_list.title: Upgrading the EthMagicians multisig, adding some process / basic rules

content.content: This is a thread for extended discussion on extending the multisig holders for the EthMagicians wallet:   github.com/ethereum-magicians/scrolls      Issue: Extending the multisig owners and operations ring  	 	opened by bmann 	on 2019-08-27 	 	 	  After discussing with @jpitts, we are adding Megan and James to the EthMagicians multisig and operations ring. Right now the multisig is...        TLDR @meknab & @Flash are being added. @meknab has some basic rules that she will document. We are likely to have some other things to discuss related to Osaka and ongoing.
